title: metronom
author: metronom
content: MobiPad, First Blockchain Launchpad with aMobile App!MobiPad is introducing a smarter way to do IDO!We provide projects a platform For fund Raise across different blockchain networks.Primarily built for Efinity Network, MobiPad will serve as a gateway to raise capitalfor innovative creators within the blockchain space.MobiPad is a multi-chain fundraising platform on Efinity, our launchpad will assist project creators in adopting Enjins powerful blockchainecosystem for their NFTs.Introducing MobiPad Fuel - MBP TokenMobiPad will be powered by $MBP, a cryptographicallysecured asset created on the Blockchain.MBP will function as both utility and Governance tokenpowering our multi-chain Launchpad. A token that doesit all.Circulating Supply 50,000,000 MBPMax Supply: 100,000,000 MBPhttps://mobipad.io/WhitePapper: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ayT_B0Tz1uvW8dukr-lxdkqk9lWCZc19/viewTrade: https://www.mexc.com/tr-TR/exchange/MBP_USDT?_from=search_spot_trade
